name: Stun Blaster
Lore: 'High-tech Merr-Sonn police immobilizer. Magnetic pulse slows victim''s voluntary brain signals. Creatures with thickly insulated cerebral cavities are not affected.',
Text: 'Deploy on your warrior. May target a character or creature (except rancor or Sarlacc) using 2 Force. Draw destiny. Return character (and cards deployed on character) to owner''s hand if destiny +1 > defense value. Creature lost if destiny +3 > defense value.',
